title: A good ranged champion for top
body: Hey I was wondering what a good ranged champion for top would be I have teemo he's my only ranged for top so any suggestions I got 4.5k ip

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=u9IEEzsW,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-05-27T04:38:09.767+0000)
>
> Don't play ranged tops ty

That's what I should have said actually. Don't play ranged champs. That way I can continue to smoosh people like you who have the meta mindset and only play melee bruisers up top. Good luck playing melee vs Swain while I scale up and become just as tanky and devastating in a teamfight as any melee top
Yorick and pantheon have ranged abilities, but are not considered ranged champons lol. but yorick is great fun, huge lane bully
Both Pantheon and Yorick are lane bullies. :P Kayle is also a melee champion with ranged abilities.
When you play ranged tops, you make baby jesus cry
Swain, Gnar, Jayce, Quinn, Graves, Vlad
Gnar is great, i like Jayce too
Kennen would be a nice champion to pick up too.
Zyra, Karma and Elise are good, if you know how to play them.
Karma, Lyssandra, Gnar, Jayce, Quinn, Graves
